primary_changes: Implemented file size validation before saving
Updated file reading and saving mechanism

patterns_discovered: Explicit error messaging with size details
Preemptive file content reading for validation
gotchas_discovered: Need to read entire file content into memory before validation
Converting bytes to human-readable megabytes for error message
Ensuring upload directory exists before file save

performance_considerations: Reads entire file into memory before saving
Potential memory overhead for large files

recommendations: Consider streaming file size check to reduce memory usage
Add logging for rejected file uploads
Implement more granular file type and extension validation
Use async file writing methods if possible
